result.ga: Is breá liom dul chuig ceolchoirmeacha
result.orig: Is breá liom dul chuig ceolchoirmeacha
result.html: Is breá liom dul chuig ceolchoirmeachaI love going to concerts.
result.ponchtml: Is breá liom dul ċuig ceolċoirmeaċaI love going to concerts.

result.html: Téim chuig ceolchoirmeacha go minicI often go to concerts.
result.ponchtml: Téim ċuig ceolċoirmeaċa go minicI often go to concerts.

result.html: An dtéann tú chuig ceolchoirmeachaDo you go to concerts?
result.ponchtml: An dtéann tú ċuig ceolċoirmeaċaDo you go to concerts?

result.eng: I go to concerts as well.
result.html: Téim chuig ceolchoirmeacha freisinI go to concerts as well.
result.ponchtml: Téim ċuig ceolċoirmeaċa freisinI go to concerts as well.
